xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.13 Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika » 1.13.3 Appamāṇārammaṇapada » 1.13.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittārammaṇattika
Appamāṇārammaṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
403.
871Hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
404.
872Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
873Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
874Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
875(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
876Hetudukaparittārammaṇattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.14 Hetuduka, Hīnattika >>
